TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UIElement3DAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer

summary.span: 向 UI 自动化公开 类型。

span.span: Exposes types to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，从继承的任何类都 使用 来与 UI 自动化通信。By default, any class that inherits from uses to communicate with UI Automation. 如果创建一个继承自的类 ，则可能需要提供自动化对等方以支持类的功能。If you create a class that inherits from , you may want to provide an automation peer to support the functionality of your class. 重写 方法以返回一个字符串，该字符串表示与关联的元素的类型 。Override the method to return a string that represents the type of the element associated with the . 例如，如果创建一个名为的类 `My3DElement` 和一个名为的自动化对等方 `My3DElementAutomationPeer` ，则重写 方法以返回字符串 "My3DElement"。For example, if you create a class called `My3DElement` and an automation peer called `My3DElementAutomationPeer`, override the method to return the string "My3DElement". 如果你的类与其中一个已知控件类型匹配，则重写 方法以返回该 。If your class matches one of the known control types, override the method to return that . 请注意，尽管现有 值通常与2d 控件关联，但 指示控件的功能，而不是其外观。Note that although the existing values are generally associated with 2D controls, the indicates a control's functionality, not its appearance. 因此，如果在 用户单击某个操作时调用该操作，则可能要 返回 。So if your invokes an action when the user clicks it, you probably want to return . 自定义的行为 决定了应重写的其他方法。The behavior of your custom determines what other methods you should override. 中的每个方法主题 描述如何使用方法以及何时适合重写方法。Each method topic in the describes how the method is used and when it is appropriate to override it. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不是内容元素，则重写 方法 。Override the method if your is not a content element. Content 元素包含向用户显示的数据。A content element contains data that is presented to the user. 内容元素的一个示例是列表框中的项或对话框上的按钮。An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button on a dialog box. 通常使用非 content 元素（也称为外围元素）来操作复合控件中的内容。You typically use non-content elements, which are also called peripheral elements, to manipulate the content in a composite control. 下拉控件上的按钮是非 content 元素的一个示例。An example of a non-content element is the button on a drop-down control. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不指示元素是否可见。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情况下，元素位于屏幕上，但仍不可见。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 例如，如果元素位于屏幕上，但被其他元素遮盖，则它可能不可见。For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 在这种情况下，该方法将返回 `false` 。In this case the method returns `false`. 从继承的类 通常不需要重写 。Classes that inherit from typically do not need to override . .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).
